title: "What does the Course Level One in Roma for 5 days Cover?"
first_phrase: This text is a summary of a hypnosis course that lasted five days, where different exercises related to induction, presence, crisis, regression, and magnetism were conducted. The last 200 tokens of the text provide an overview of the content covered on the last day. This last part is about tools and techniques for self-healing and includes different exercises for stopping pain, massaging, and quitting smoking. It also includes an exam and deepening technique, Indian Self-hypnosis, and increasing allergy resistance with the Ball technique. The text ends with an introduction to an induction exercise using light and regression.

last_phrase: In conclusion, completing Course Level One in Roma for 5 days can equip individuals with a comprehensive understanding of basic exercises, magnetic passes, induction techniques, catalepsy, presence, and regression, among others. This course aims to develop students' healing abilities using magnetic massage, magnetism, self-hypnosis, and other techniques. Completing the course could be beneficial in solving various health problems, addictions, and phobias. By attending the course, individuals can polish their skills and learn new techniques such as the Di Pisa hyperflexibility exercise, Campanelli technique, and Water technique to achieve a new self and self-healing abilities.
